Key_Achievements: Monastery reform document; Defended family law for non-Muslims; First metropolitan to become Pope
Major_Challenges: Holy Synod vs General Council conflict; Short reign; Forced into exile at monasteries

Key_Achievements: Founded Institute of Coptic Studies (1954); Granted Ethiopian Church autocephaly
Major_Challenges: Corruption scandal; Kidnapping (1954); Removed from office by Holy Synod; Accusations of simony
Cultural_Impact: Modern theological education; Ethiopian Church independence

Key_Achievements: Zeitoun Marian Apparitions; Returned St. Mark relics from Venice; Monastery revival; St. Mark Cathedral Cairo
Major_Challenges: Dealing with Nasser government; Church property nationalization; Monastery restoration
Cultural_Impact: Spiritual revival; Monastic renewal; Miraculous Zeitoun apparitions witnessed by millions

Key_Achievements: Longest papacy (41 years); Church global expansion (250+ parishes in North America); First Coptic Pope to visit Vatican (1973); Sunday School movement
Major_Challenges: House arrest by Sadat (1981-1985); Sectarian tensions; Islamization policies; Church-state relations
Cultural_Impact: Global Coptic diaspora identity; Ecumenical dialogue; Political activism for Coptic rights

Key_Achievements: Cathedral of Nativity of Christ (New Administrative Capital); New headquarters Triangle of Hope; 60 bishops consecrated; Church Construction Law (2016)
Major_Challenges: Post-revolution Egypt; Alexandria Cathedral bombing (2017); Modernization of church administration
Cultural_Impact: Digital age church leadership; New Egypt vision; Cathedral diplomacy
